docs.title: Usage

docs.text: API 1. Get specific style field on page Method URL Body GET /api/fields/facade { "source": "https://loukaskotas.com", "fields": [ "font-family" ] } 2. Get specific style fields of specific tags on page Method URL Body GET /api/fields/tags/facade { "source": "http://loukaskotas.com", "fields": [ "font-family", "color", "background-color", "border" ], "tags": [ "h1" ] } 3. Get screenshot of specific element on page Method URL Body GET /api/screenshots/element/facade { "source": "https://loukaskotas.com", "elementId": "experience" } 4. Get Screenshot of whole page Method URL Body GET /api/screenshots/domain/facade { "source": "http://loukaskotas.com" } 5. Get all fonts from page Method URL Body GET /api/fonts/facade { "source": "http://loukaskotas.com" } 6. Compare Two Screenshots Method URL Body GET /api/screenshots/compare/facade { "source": "http://loukaskotas.com", "elementId": "experience" }
